alert.note: Alert for Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 2:35PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Elbert and southern Lincoln Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 234 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Punkin Center, or 27 miles south of Limon, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kutch, Punkin Center and Karval. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County
